verses.verse: And <S%G450>rising<s%> up, He <S%G2064>went<s%> from <S%G1564>there<s%> to the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> and <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan;<s%> and <S%G3793>crowds<s%> <S%G4848>gathered<s%> <S%G4314>around<s%> Him <S%G3825>again,<s%> and, <S%G5613>according<s%> to His <S%G1486>custom,<s%> He <S%G3825>once<s%> <S%G3825>more<s%> [began] to <S%G1321>teach<s%> them.

And [some] <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up to Him, <S%G3985>testing<s%> Him, and [began] to <S%G1905>question<s%> Him <S%G1487>whether<s%> it was <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G435>man<s%> to <S%G630>divorce<s%> a <S%G1135>wife.<s%>
And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> did <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1781>command<s%> you?"
And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3475>"Moses<s%> <S%G2010>permitted<s%> [a man] to <S%G1125>write<s%> a <S%G975>certificate<s%> of <S%G647>divorce<s%> and <S%G630>send<s%> [her] <S%G630>away.<s%>"
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4314>"Because<s%> of your <S%G4641>hardness<s%> of <S%G4641>heart<s%> he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> you <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1785>commandment.<s%>
" But from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G2937>creation,<s%> [God] <S%G4160>made<s%> them <S%G7021>male<s%> and <S%G2338>female.<s%>
"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1752>cause<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2641>leave<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother,<s%>

and the <S%G1417>two<s%> shall <S%G1510>become<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> <S%G5620>consequently<s%> they are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
<S%G3739>"What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4801>joined<s%> <S%G4801>together,<s%> let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5563>separate.<s%>"
And in the <S%G3614>house<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> [began] <S%G1905>questioning<s%> Him <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3825>again.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3739>"Whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G630>divorces<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> and <S%G1060>marries<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G243>woman<s%> <S%G3429>commits<s%> <S%G3429>adultery<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> her;

and <S%G1437>if<s%> she <S%G846>herself<s%> <S%G630>divorces<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%> and <S%G1060>marries<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G243>man,<s%> she is <S%G3431>committing<s%> <S%G3429>adultery.<s%> "
And they were <S%G4374>bringing<s%> <S%G3813>children<s%> to Him <S%G2443>so<s%> that He might <S%G681>touch<s%> them; and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> them.

But when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> this, He was <S%G23>indignant<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G863>"Permit<s%> the <S%G3813>children<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to Me; do not <S%G2967>hinder<s%> them; for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1510>belongs<s%> to <S%G5108>such<s%> as <S%G5108>these.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> does not <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G3813>child<s%> shall not <S%G1525>enter<s%> it [at all.]"
And He <S%G1723>took<s%> them in His <S%G1723>arms<s%> and [began] <S%G7108>blessing<s%> them, <S%G5087>laying<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> upon them.

And as He was <S%G1607>setting<s%> out on a <S%G3598>journey,<s%> a <S%G1520>man<s%> <S%G4370>ran<s%> up to Him and <S%G1120>knelt<s%> <S%G1120>before<s%> Him, and [began] <S%G1905>asking<s%> Him, <S%G18>"Good<s%> <S%G1320>Teacher,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do you <S%G3004>call<s%> Me <S%G18>good<s%>? <S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1520>alone.<s%>

"You <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> 'Do not <S%G5407>murder,<s%> Do not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> Do not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> Do not <S%G5576>bear<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> <S%G5576>witness,<s%> Do not <S%G650>defraud,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother.<s%>'"
And he <S%G5346>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> I have <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> from my <S%G3503>youth<s%> up."

And <S%G1689>looking<s%> at him, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>felt<s%> a <S%G25>love<s%> for him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1520>"One<s%> <S%G1520>thing<s%> you <S%G5302>lack:<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> and <S%G4453>sell<s%> <S%G3745>all<s%> you <S%G2192>possess,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> and <S%G1204>come,<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> Me."

But at <S%G3588>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> his <S%G4768>face<s%> <S%G4768>fell,<s%> and he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>grieved,<s%> for he was one who <S%G2192>owned<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2933>property.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4017>looking<s%> <S%G4017>around,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1423>hard<s%> it will be for <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G5536>wealthy<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2284>amazed<s%> at His <S%G3056>words.<s%> But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5043>"Children,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1422>hard<s%> it is to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>

"It is <S%G2123>easier<s%> for a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to <S%G1330>go<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5168>eye<s%> of a <S%G4476>needle<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for a <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
And they were <S%G4057>even<s%> <S%G4057>more<s%> <S%G1605>astonished<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2532>"Then<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved<s%>?"

<S%G1689>Looking<s%> upon them, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "With <S%G444>men<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible,<s%> but not with <S%G2316>God;<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1415>possible<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to Him, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> we have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> You."

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, there is <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G68>farms,<s%> for My <S%G1752>sake<s%> and for the gospel's <S%G1752>sake,<s%>

but that he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G1542>hundred<s%> <S%G1542>times<s%> as <S%G1542>much<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> in the <S%G3778>present<s%> <S%G2540>age,<s%> <S%G3614>houses<s%> and <S%G80>brothers<s%> and <S%G79>sisters<s%> and <S%G3384>mothers<s%> and <S%G5043>children<s%> and <S%G68>farms,<s%> along with <S%G1375>persecutions;<s%> and in the <S%G165>age<s%> to <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
"But <S%G4183>many<s%> [who are] <S%G4413>first,<s%> will be <S%G2078>last;<s%> and the <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G4413>first.<s%>"

And they were on the <S%G3598>road,<s%> <S%G305>going<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G4254>walking<s%> on <S%G4254>ahead<s%> of them; and they were <S%G2284>amazed,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G190>followed<s%> were <S%G5399>fearful.<s%> And <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3880>aside<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>tell<s%> them <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G4819>happen<s%> to Him,

[saying,] <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> we are <S%G305>going<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes;<s%> and they will <S%G2632>condemn<s%> Him to <S%G2288>death,<s%> and will <S%G3860>deliver<s%> Him to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

"And they will <S%G1702>mock<s%> Him and <S%G1716>spit<s%> upon Him, and <S%G3146>scourge<s%> Him, and <S%G615>kill<s%> [Him,] and <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>later<s%> He will <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>"

And <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G4365>came<s%> up to Him, <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G2309>want<s%> You to <S%G4160>do<s%> for us <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%> of You."
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> Me to <S%G4160>do<s%> for you?"

And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1325>"Grant<s%> that we may <S%G2523>sit<s%> in Your <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> on Your <S%G1188>right,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> on [Your] <S%G710>left.<s%>"

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you are <S%G154>asking<s%> for. Are you <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> that I <S%G4095>drink,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> I am <S%G907>baptized<s%>?"

And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "We are <S%G1410>able.<s%>" And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "The <S%G4221>cup<s%> that I <S%G4095>drink<s%> you shall <S%G4095>drink;<s%> and you shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> I am <S%G907>baptized.<s%>

"But to <S%G2523>sit<s%> on My <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> on [My] <S%G2176>left,<s%> this is not <S%G1699>Mine<s%> to <S%G1325>give;<s%> but it is for those for <S%G3739>whom<s%> it has been <S%G2090>prepared.<s%>"
And <S%G191>hearing<s%> this, the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G23>feel<s%> <S%G23>indignant<s%> with <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John.<s%>

And <S%G4341>calling<s%> them to Himself, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G1380>recognized<s%> as <S%G757>rulers<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2634>lord<s%> it <S%G2634>over<s%> them; and their <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3173>men<s%> <S%G2715>exercise<s%> <S%G2715>authority<s%> <S%G2715>over<s%> them.

"But it is not <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you shall be your <S%G1249>servant;<s%>
and <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to be <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you shall be <S%G1401>slave<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%>

"For <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> did not <S%G2064>come<s%> to be <S%G1247>served,<s%> but to <S%G1247>serve,<s%> and to <S%G1325>give<s%> His <S%G5590>life<s%> a <S%G3083>ransom<s%> for <S%G4183>many.<s%>"

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2410>Jericho.<s%> And as He was <S%G1607>going<s%> out from <S%G2410>Jericho<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and a <S%G2425>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> a <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G4319>beggar<s%> [named] <S%G924>Bartimaeus,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G5090>Timaeus,<s%> was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> by the <S%G3598>road.<s%>

And when he <S%G191>heard<s%> that it was <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G3479>Nazarene,<s%> he <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2896>cry<s%> out and <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus,<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me!"

And <S%G4183>many<s%> were <S%G2008>sternly<s%> <S%G2008>telling<s%> him to be <S%G4623>quiet,<s%> but he kept <S%G2896>crying<s%> out <S%G4183>all<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> <S%G5207>"Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me!"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stopped<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5455>"Call<s%> him [here.]" And they <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, <S%G2293>"Take<s%> <S%G2293>courage,<s%> <S%G1453>arise!<s%> He is <S%G5455>calling<s%> for you."
And <S%G577>casting<s%> <S%G577>aside<s%> his <S%G2440>cloak,<s%> he <S%G7015>jumped<s%> up, and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G611>answering<s%> him, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> Me to <S%G4160>do<s%> for you?" And the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4462>"Rabboni,<s%> [I want] to <S%G308>regain<s%> my <S%G308>sight!<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5217>"Go<s%> your <S%G5217>way;<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you <S%G4982>well.<s%>" And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> he <S%G308>regained<s%> his <S%G308>sight<s%> and [began] <S%G190>following<s%> Him on the <S%G3598>road.<s%>
